FuncDef: The display map rule command displays basic mapping rule (BMR) configurations.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a BMR name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.The string can contain spaces if it is enclosed with double quotation marks (").

ExtraInfo:
To view the BMR configurations, run the display map rule command in any view.
If the BMR name is configured, the configuration of a specified BMR is displayed.If no BMR name is configured, the configurations of all BMRs are displayed.
